Welcome to oxDNA UTILS documentation!¶

Scripts¶

generate Generates oxDNA configuration and topology files.
output_bonds Prints out all interactions in the system.

Modules¶

base Utility functions for oxDNA systems, strands and nucleotides.
origami_utils Utility functions for DNA origamis designed in cadnano and simulated in oxDNA.
readers Reads oxDNA configuration and topology files.
